name: Ollama Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Ollama Tool 节点。主要用于: Interact with Ollama AI models

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Interact with Ollama AI models | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: text
available_options: Image (值: image)
Text (值: text)
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: message
available_options: Message a Model (值: message) - Send a message to Ollama model
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

modelId.name: modelId
modelId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Model | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

text.name: text
text.natural_language_description: 参数名: Text Input | 默认值: What's in this image?

inputType.name: inputType
inputType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Type | 默认值: binary
available_options: Binary File(s) (值: binary)
Image URL(s) (值: url)

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.description: Name of the binary field(s) which contains the image(s), separate multiple field names with commas
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Data Field Name(s) | 作用: Name of the binary field(s) which contains the image(s), separate multiple field names with commas | 提示: The name of the input field containing the binary file data to be processed | 默认值: data

imageUrls.name: imageUrls
imageUrls.description: URL(s) of the image(s) to analyze, multiple URLs can be added separated by comma
imageUrls.natural_language_description: 参数名: URL(s) | 作用: URL(s) of the image(s) to analyze, multiple URLs can be added separated by comma

simplify.name: simplify
simplify.description: Whether to simplify the response or not
simplify.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify Output | 作用: Whether to simplify the response or not | 默认值: True

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: system (值: None) - System message to set the context for the conversation
temperature (值: None) - Controls randomness in responses. Lower values make output more focused.
top_p (值: None) - The maximum cumulative probability of tokens to consider when sampling
top_k (值: None) - Controls diversity by limiting the number of top tokens to consider
num_predict (值: None) - Maximum number of tokens to generate in the completion
frequency_penalty (值: None) - Adjusts the penalty for tokens that have already appeared in the generated text. Higher values discourage repetition.
presence_penalty (值: None) - Adjusts the penalty for tokens based on their presence in the generated text so far. Positive values penalize tokens that have already appeared, encouraging diversity.
repeat_penalty (值: None) - Sets how strongly to penalize repetitions. A higher value (e.g., 1.5) will penalize repetitions more strongly, while a lower value (e.g., 0.9) will be more lenient.
num_ctx (值: None) - Sets the size of the context window used to generate the next token
repeat_last_n (值: None) - Sets how far back for the model to look back to prevent repetition. (0 = disabled, -1 = num_ctx).

min_p (值: None) - Alternative to the top_p, and aims to ensure a balance of quality and variety. The parameter p represents the minimum probability for a token to be considered, relative to the probability of the most likely token.
seed (值: None) - Sets the random number seed to use for generation. Setting this to a specific number will make the model generate the same text for the same prompt.
stop (值: None) - Sets the stop sequences to use. When this pattern is encountered the LLM will stop generating text and return. Separate multiple patterns with commas
keep_alive (值: None) - Specifies the duration to keep the loaded model in memory after use. Format: 1h30m (1 hour 30 minutes).
low_vram (值: None) - Whether to activate low VRAM mode, which reduces memory usage at the cost of slower generation speed. Useful for GPUs with limited memory.
main_gpu (值: None) - Specifies the ID of the GPU to use for the main computation. Only change this if you have multiple GPUs.
num_batch (值: None) - Sets the batch size for prompt processing. Larger batch sizes may improve generation speed but increase memory usage.
num_gpu (值: None) - Specifies the number of GPUs to use for parallel processing. Set to -1 for auto-detection.
num_thread (值: None) - Specifies the number of CPU threads to use for processing. Set to 0 for auto-detection.
penalize_newline (值: None) - Whether the model will be less likely to generate newline characters, encouraging longer continuous sequences of text
use_mlock (值: None) - Whether to lock the model in memory to prevent swapping. This can improve performance but requires sufficient available memory.
use_mmap (值: None) - Whether to use memory mapping for loading the model. This can reduce memory usage but may impact performance.
vocab_only (值: None) - Whether to only load the model vocabulary without the weights. Useful for quickly testing tokenization.
format (值: None) - Specifies the format of the API response

messages.name: messages
messages.natural_language_description: 参数名: Messages | 默认值: {'values': [{'content': '', 'role': 'user'}]}
available_options: values (值: None)
